GClasses::ArrayHolder

GClasses::ArrayHolder< T > Class Template Reference

Just like Holder, except for arrays. More...

#include <GHolders.h>

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class GClasses::ArrayHolder< T >

Just like Holder, except for arrays.
